priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Reason For Treatment Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C102584

self.title: CDISC SDTM Reason For Treatment Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the reason the treatment was administered.
name: Reason For Treatment
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Reason For Treatment Terminology

terms.definition: A lack of response to the first cycle of therapy.
A lack of response to more than one cycle of therapy.
A previous episode of failure by a patient to follow medical advice, take medication as directed, or adhere to a prescribed course of treatment.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.
